name: Security Training from BinaryMist
remark: We run many types of info-sec security training, covering Physical, People, VPS, Networs, Cloud, Web Applications. Most of the content is sourced from the [book series](https://leanpub.com/b/holisticinfosecforwebdevelopers) Kim has been working on for several years. More info can be found [here](https://binarymist.io/#services)
